name: Plith
description: Plith puts gamers in a spatial setting, where they have to manage several puzzle elements (mostly gears) and must make quick decisions which can simplify or complicate their path to victory.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or newer Processor: 1 GHz processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 150 MB available space

reviews.review_text: 1st the game crashed instantly every time until I restarted my computer after install and now crashes after playing for a few min. There is horrible lag in the movement of the gears.
